item1:
命令数据的查询
Query of command data
item2:
可查询所有已完成和未完成的搬运命令数据
Query all completed and unfinished handling order data
item4:
最近29,998笔内的命令数据
Order data in the last 29,998 entries
item5:
命令信息的查询条件
Query conditions for command information
item7:
如果无符合条件的命令数据，系统将提示查无此命令信息
If there is no command data that meets the requirements, the system will prompt you to check for no command information.
item8:
1. 输入查询条件或挑选Cmd. No后点选Query查询命令数据
Enter query conditions or select Cmd. No and click Query to query command data
